Pre-Game Insights: West Indies has won the T20 World Cup title twice, in 2012 and 2016.
They have been poor in recent T20 World Cup editions, winning only one out of five games in 2021 and failing to make the Super 12 in 2022.
Players like Andre Russell and Nicholas Pooran performed well in IPL 2024, while Rovman Powell and Shimron Hetmyer had decent campaigns.
West Indies beat Australia in their only warm-up match at Port of Spain, scoring 257-4 and holding Australia to 227-7.
Andre Russell and Nicholas Pooran starred with the bat, scoring 72 off 25 and 52 off 25 respectively.
Gudakesh Motie and Alzarri Joseph claimed two wickets each.
